Class GameFlowManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.controller.core.GameFlowManager
public class GameFlowManager extends Object
Manages the flow of game events when bricks move down. Handles collision detection, brick placement, row clearing, and garbage row mechanics.

This class coordinates between:

  • The Board for movement and collision
  • The ScoreManager for scoring
  • The EventPublisher for notifying listeners
  • The GarbageMechanic for special level features
See Also:

  • ScoreManager
  • GarbageMechanic
